search.query: | makeresults | eval data="A/P - Close Module - FM1,1,7.52,2.00,6.00;A/P - Diagnosis- Run Search - FM1,2,4.01,100.00,100.00;A/P - Sample Test - FM1,3,4.5,3.00,6.00;" | makemv data delim=";" | mvexpand data | eval data=split(data,",") | eval Transaction=mvindex(data,0),count=mvindex(data,1),"Average Response Time"=mvindex(data,2),Objective=mvindex(data,3),Threshold=mvindex(data,4) | table Transaction count "Average Response Time" Objective Threshold | eval "Average Response Time SLA"=case('Average Response Time'>=Threshold,"severe",'Average Response Time'<Threshold AND 'Average Response Time'>=Objective,"elevated",true(),"low")

| makeresults | eval data="A/P - Close Module - FM1,1,7.52,2.00,6.00;A/P - Diagnosis- Run Search - FM1,2,4.01,100.00,100.00;A/P - Sample Test - FM1,3,4.5,3.00,6.00;" | makemv data delim=";" | mvexpand data | eval data=split(data,",") | eval Transaction=mvindex(data,0),count=mvindex(data,1),"Average Response Time"=mvindex(data,2),Objective=mvindex(data,3),Threshold=mvindex(data,4) | table Transaction count "Average Response Time" Objective Threshold | eval "Average Response Time SLA"=case('Average Response Time'>=Threshold,"severe",'Average Response Time'<Threshold AND 'Average Response Time'>=Objective,"elevated",true(),"low")
